init.description: initialize the 'clisci' configuration files, this command MUST be executed in the directory where the user wants to store the project.

path.name: path
path.description: provide a path where the config files are located, if not set, the current directory is used

server.name: server
server.description: initialize a simple 'express.js' server for receive asynchronous responses

invoke.description: invoke a target smart contract's function/method starting from a smart contract's descriptor.

path.name: path
path.description: provide a path where the config files are located, if not set, the current directory is used

contract.name: contract
contract.description: name of the contract to interact with

method.name: method
method.description: (required) name of the request's target function/method

value.name: value
value.description: target function or event parameter's value, if more than one value is required you can set this flag multiple times (the order is important!)

callback.name: callback
callback.description: callback URL to which the gateway will send all asynchronous responses

timeout.name: timeout
timeout.description: timeout that the gateway have to wait before block the operation

signature.name: signature
signature.description: cryptographic hash function's name that has to be used to sign the request

file.name: file
file.description: path to a JSON file that contains all required parameter for the specific request

query.description: query past event occurences or function invocations

path.name: path
path.description: provide a path where the config files are located, if not set, the current directory is used

contract.name: contract
contract.description: name of the contract to interact with

method.name: method
method.description: (required) name of the request's target function/method

event.name: event
event.description: (required) name of the request's target event

val.name: val
val.description: target function or event parameter's value, if more than one value is required you can set this flag multiple times (the order is important!)

filter.name: filter
filter.description: C-style boolean expression over function/event parameters

startTime.name: startTime
startTime.description: start time from which start considering event occurrences or function invocations

endTime.name: endTime
endTime.description: end time from which stop considering event occurrences or function invocations

file.name: file
file.description: path to a JSON file that contains all required parameter for the specific request

subscribe.description: monitor a target smart contract's function invocations or event occurrences starting from a smart contract's descriptor.

path.name: path
path.description: provide a path where the config files are located, if not set, the current directory is used

contract.name: contract
contract.description: name of the contract to interact with

method.name: method
method.description: (required) name of the request's target function/method

event.name: event
event.description: (required) name of the request's target event

val.name: val
val.description: target function or event parameter's value, if more than one value is required you can set this flag multiple times (the order is important!)

callback.name: callback
callback.description: callback URL to which the gateway will send all asynchronous responses

filter.name: filter
filter.description: C-style boolean expression over function/event parameters

file.name: file
file.description: path to a JSON file that contains all required parameter for the specific request

unsubscribe.description: stop live monitoring of a smart contract's function or event by unsubscribing a previous subscription.

path.name: path
path.description: provide a path where the config files are located, if not set, the current directory is used

contract.name: contract
contract.description: name of the contract to interact with

method.name: method
method.description: (required) name of the request's target function/method

event.name: event
event.description: (required) name of the request's target event

val.name: val
val.description: target function or event parameter's value, if more than one value is required you can set this flag multiple times (the order is important!)

file.name: file
file.description: path to a JSON file that contains all required parameter for the specific request

scdl:add.description: add a new SCDL descriptor in the local directory.

path.name: path
path.description: provide a path where the config files are located, if not set, the current directory is used

local.name: local
local.description: add a new descriptor from a local file path

remote.name: remote
remote.description: add a new descriptor from a remote online registry

args.name: id
args.description: path to a local SCDL file or a unique identifier inside the online registry

scdl:delete.description: delete a specific descriptor from the local directory

path.name: path
path.description: provide a path where the config files are located, if not set, the current directory is used

args.name: name
args.description: name of the contract's descriptor to delete

scdl:list.description: list saved SCDL smart contract's descriptors

path.name: path
path.description: provide a path where the config files are located, if not set, the current directory is used
